title: Handle an Immigration Case
description: HR is sponsoring a work visa (e.g., H-1B) for a new hire and must work with outside counsel to file the petition.

tasks.description: Gather all required information from the employee (e.g., passport, educational degrees).
tasks.expected_outcome: The mobility specialist collects all necessary documents from the employee.

tasks.description: Provide the collected documents and job details securely to the external immigration law firm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist sends the complete packet to the attorneys.

tasks.description: Track the status of the case with the law firm and provide updates to the employee and their manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist checks in with the law firm and communicates the case status internally.
